Welcome to the Legacy Center

Our co-working spaces inspire a community of people who work hard to make a life, not just a living. So grab some coffee, find a desk, and take your work and business to another level.

Co-Working Info

Birth Of A New Legacy

We help you change your life & grow your business

Welcome to the Legacy Center, bringing you the ultimate city co-working space in Atlanta. Amazing, open-plan, first floor offices in this new complex within a growing business area will give you the business address you need to build your company.

You’ll have everything you need to run your business and meet with clients, in a stylish, modern lobby with newly built café.
